DOC.detailed_description: Diabetes grow health problem cause personal suffering , comorbid condition , premature death , high cost individual , health care system society . Many problem prevent delayed control disease . This turn require daily self-management patient . The CDC recognize importance self-management setting 2010 objective 60 % diabetic receive diabetes education . Unfortunately , many people receive education available wish participate small group one one education . The Internet may offer viable alternative . We evaluate Internet base small group Diabetes Self-Management Program . This program adapt Chronic Disease Self-Management Program Online , already develop currently evaluate investigator . Participants type 2 diabetes randomize participate Internet Program serve control continue usual care . Treatment subject participate structure 6 week interactive web-based online class 20-24 participant 2 train peer moderator . Data collect online baseline , 6 month 1 year . Outcome measure include health relate quality life ( fatigue , physical discomfort , symptom hypoglycemia hyperglycemia , activity limitation , health distress , self-rated health ) , metabolic control ( hemoglobin A1c ) , health care utilization ( decrease outpatient visit physician , increase percentage participant receive eye examination past year , increase number time health professional examine participant ' foot , decrease emergency department visit , hospitalization , hospital day ) , health behavior ( aerobic exercise , communication physician , diet , glucose self-monitoring , self-examination foot ) , self-efficacy manage diabetes . If successful , project result new effective mean reach CDC objective importantly improve quality life health status people diabetes reduce health care utilization thus cost .
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes Live United States Access internet email account Under 18 year age Pregnant Treatment cancer past 12 month Have take Stanford selfmanagement program previously
